text: While using our App, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.

We use data provided by our application for Slack(tm) only to address functionality necessary to share calendar data, namely your Slack(tm) identifying info (Workspace and User IDs) such that Free Blocks can tie it to Google Calendar data.
Free Blocks LLC ("us", "we", or "our") operates applications (collectively, the "App").

We may use your Personal Information to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information.
We use your Personal Information only for providing and improving the App.
